/** * Updates the CRC-64 checksum with the specified array of bytes. *
* Note that BioJava before version 6.0 implemented this method incorrectly, * using {@code length} as an index. * * @throws IllegalArgumentException * if {@code offset} is negative, or {@code length} is negative, or * {@code offset+length} is negative or greater than the length of * the array {@code b}. */
